activities.name: SQL onprem tables to raw archive

dependsOn.activity: SQL onprem tables to raw archive

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLDBstaging
SQLDBstaging select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotten Tomato} = {Rotton Tomato},
		each(match(position==1),
			$$+'short' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(toInteger(year) > 1950) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(PrimaryGenre = iif( locate('|',genres) > 1, left(genres, locate('|',genres)-1), genres)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 window(over(PrimaryGenre,
		year),
	desc({Rotten Tomato}, true),
	RatingsRank = rank()) ~> RankMovingsByRate
RankMovingsByRate aggregate(groupBy(PrimaryGenre,
		year),
	AverageRating = avg(toInteger({Rotten Tomato})),
		HighestRated = first(title),
		LowestRated = last(title),
		NumberOfMovies = count()) ~> AggregateRatings
AggregateRatings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
AggregateRatings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PrimaryGenre as string,
		year as integer,
		AverageRating as double,
		HighestRated as string,
		LowestRated as string,
		NumberOfMovies as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		{Rotton Tomato} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> adlssource
adlssource select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotten Tomato} = {Rotton Tomato},
		each(match(position==1),
			$$+'short' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(toInteger(year) > 1950) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(PrimaryGenre = iif( locate('|',genres) > 1, left(genres, locate('|',genres)-1), genres)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 window(over(PrimaryGenre,
		year),
	desc({Rotten Tomato}, true),
	RatingsRank = rank()) ~> RankMovingsByRate
RankMovingsByRate aggregate(groupBy(PrimaryGenre,
		year),
	AverageRating = avg(toInteger({Rotten Tomato})),
		HighestRated = first(title),
		LowestRated = last(title),
		NumberOfMovies = count()) ~> AggregateRatings
AggregateRatings alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertIfTrue
UpsertIfTrue sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['PrimaryGenre','year'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		{Rotton Tomato} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> adlssource
adlssource select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotten Tomato} = {Rotton Tomato},
		each(match(position==1),
			$$+'short' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(toInteger(year) > 1950) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(PrimaryGenre = iif( locate('|',genres) > 1, left(genres, locate('|',genres)-1), genres)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 window(over(PrimaryGenre,
		year),
	desc({Rotten Tomato}, true),
	RatingsRank = rank()) ~> RankMovingsByRate
RankMovingsByRate aggregate(groupBy(PrimaryGenre,
		year),
	AverageRating = avg(toInteger({Rotten Tomato})),
		HighestRated = first(title),
		LowestRated = last(title),
		NumberOfMovies = count()) ~> AggregateRatings
AggregateRatings alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> UpsertIfTrue
UpsertIfTrue sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PrimaryGenre as string,
		year as integer,
		AverageRating as double,
		HighestRated as string,
		LowestRated as string,
		NumberOfMovies as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		SystemInformationID as string,
		{ Database Version} as string,
		{ VersionDate} as string,
		{ ModifiedDate} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive({ VersionDate3dig} = toTimestamp('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

on prem SQL to staging SQL
Tranform and write to final SQLDB
